text:
What up guys it is DJ BBQ here at a blacksmiths,
a forge, Blenheim forge in Peckham London

I've come here to experiment with heat and
meat we're gonna be cooking at high intensities

and see what happens the forge can rock some
crazy temperatures it can get up to 2000 degrees

centigrade I'm gonna do an extreme burger
amazing meat fat flavours I'm gonna grill

some pineapple and onion and do like a salsa
a relish I've chosen three different cuts

of beef I'm gonna test these burger patties
against each one another and also against

the heat over here we've got chuck now chuck
is the classic meat used for burgers and it's

got all that lovely fat, you see all that
marbling, and then you've got brazing steak

from the shoulder cut y'know towards the chuck
but a lot leaner but I've got some cal fat

kind of fat lacing or fat netting to kind
of help that along I'm gonna encase the burger

with this kinda webbing right here and that's
really important because fat is flavour but

it's also gonna act as a buffer, as a protector
on the super high heat we've got short rib

a great meat for burgers again nice fat content
y'know not as much as the chuck depends on

where you get it but you've also got it near
the bone and that meat is always sweetest

when it's close to the bone don't forget the
bone marrow man I'm adding in 10% bone marrow

into my burgers for flavour and texture start
to work it all the way through, now we're

gonna make some patties and I kinda like that
imperfect burger, you can do like a smash

one where you roll it up in a ball and you
get nice little cracks in the burger like

flavour canyon now I'm gonna grab some of
this braising steak so what is gonna win man

tell me below will it be the chuck the braising
steak or will it be the short rib I wanna

hear from you guys so I've made my burger
balls but that brazing steak it needs a little

fighting chance so I'm gonna grab some of
this cal fat to wrap around that's gonna cook

in and provide more flavour so I've got them
on the plate let's take them to the forge

and get it heated up man let's cook these
bad boys alright let's fire up the forge Jon

heats up the forge so that'll turn these dense
steel bars super hot and provide a surface

to cook on whilst that steal is getting to
the right temperature I'm gonna cook up my

tasty bacon and pineapple salsa on top of
the forge, my salsa contains onions back bacon

pineapple rings and peppers oh my gosh how
good does that look so we got our topping

ready let's get the bars out and start cooking
gosh I don't even think the meat's gonna wanna

be on this I'm gonna put it on there this
is gonna go *PH-ITCHOO* here's the chuck,

get a bit of salt on it, pepper, pepper can
burn so just a tiny bit you guys ready? I'm

just gonna throw it down and I'm gonna flatten
it that is working man, it's already getting

a bark on it man it's that hot we just put
it down, it's too hot the first burger the

chuck one didn't work I pressed it, so now
I'm gonna have it pre-pressed and I'm gonna

try and lay it on there it's cooled down a
little bit not as crazy stupidly hot this

is the short rib ok now it doesn't need much
time so I gotta watch it look already a crust

but I need it to cook a bit further down I
just think it's too hot it's just not cooked

in the middle guys we need the grill watch
your hands that's hot there we go let's get

the cal fat one rocking the grill lifts the
burgers off the super hot heat hopefully allowing

a more even cook on my burgers there we go
now it's working now we want that cal fat

to kind of break down so I'm gonna toast some
buns then we're gonna give it one more shot

straight onto the metal bars ok so our burgers
are done the buns are toasted that short rib

on there grab that cal fat one look at that
it's perfectly toasted oh my gosh these look

beautiful, pepper on at the end, some salt,
then we're gonna add that homemade bacon salsa,

we've done two really tasty burgers we've
still got more mince we've got steaks so we've

taken off the grill, the metal bars have cooled
down, we're gonna go back to the drawing board

and try to cook a burger straight on metal
bars cooked in the forge for those that commented

that it wasn't gonna work you were right let's
grab one of the chuck ones smash it salt on

there lay another one kind of gently on there
let's get this cal fat guy rocking I think

this is a bit more achievable to do stuff
here, now we've got a good little crust happening,

I think we've nailed it 
and there's our burgers man, short rib, the

chuck, and the cal kind of encased brazing
steak all chopped up it took a couple of trys

but we got there man, food experimentation
man, I want to hear what you guys are trying

out there comment bellow, Blenheim forge man
get over here and eat your burgers man cooked

on your metal that you cooked in your forge
so Jon I think you wanted to go for that cal

fat one that's the brazing steak and there's
the short rib for Rich and James, the chuck,

alright? Thumbs up? Oh baby, that's what I
wanted to hear that was quite sexual right

there Jon dude that is, it's cooked man that's
perfect man show them right there look at

that medium on the inside man I want a little
bit of pink with my burgers that's good meat

we got there man well that's it man the burgers
worked if you wanna see me make a cleaver

with these guys man check that video out on
my channel subscribe to Food Tube it's free
